fields.headline: NO POVERTY
fields.full_name: End poverty in all its forms everywhere

fields.headline: ZERO HUNGER
fields.full_name: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture

fields.headline: GOOD HEALTH AND WELL-BEING
fields.full_name: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages

fields.headline: QUALITY EDUCATION
fields.full_name: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all

fields.headline: GENDER EQUALITY
fields.full_name: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls

fields.headline: CLEAN WATER AND SANITATION
fields.full_name: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all

fields.headline: AFFORDABLE AND CLEAN ENERGY
fields.full_name: Ensure Access to Affordable, Reliable, Sustainable and Modern Energy for All

fields.headline: DECENT WORK AND ECONOMIC GROWTH
fields.full_name: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all

fields.headline: INDUSTRY, INNOVATION AND INFRASTRUCTURE
fields.full_name: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation

fields.headline: REDUCED INEQUALITIES
fields.full_name: Reduce inequality within and among countries

fields.headline: SUSTAINABLE CITIES AND COMMUNITIES
fields.full_name: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable

fields.headline: RESPONSIBLE CONSUMPTION & PRODUCTION
fields.full_name: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns

fields.headline: CLIMATE ACTION
fields.full_name: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts

fields.headline: LIFE BELOW WATER
fields.full_name: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development

fields.headline: LIFE ON LAND
fields.full_name: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss

fields.headline: PEACE AND JUSTICE STRONG INSTITUTIONS
fields.full_name: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels

fields.headline: PARTNERSHIPS FOR THE GOALS
fields.full_name: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development
